titles.title: I want to be bound to Jesus, bound to Jesus

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I want to be bound to Jesus, bound to Jesus
And free from death forever more
I want to be dead to sin, but alive to Him
And the fear of death won't hurt me anymore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Make me a love slave, make me a love slave
For I love my master that I serve
Put my ear up to the door
Don't let me leave never more
Make me a love slave forever to my Lord.
